CustomField.description:
Functional: •Verifies application functional conformance with user facing requirements. •Primarily manual and back-box based •Focuses on user transaction / use cases
Non-functional: •Verifies technical or non-functional requirements such as: -Platform Compatibility -Usability -Standards compliance -Failover / high availability
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Functional: •Verifies application functional conformance with user req's •Focuses on user transaction / use cases
Non-functional: •Verifies technical or non-functional requirements such as: -Platform Compatibility -Usability -Compliance
CustomField.label: Type
